chapter.title: Test of Copy-To and Image Resolution

body.p: When a topic contains a reference to an image and is involved in copy-to based relocation, the final relative path to the image may be wrong if the copy-to is not accounted for properly. Bertrand has analyzed the problem like so:

ul.li:
case 1: topic contains an image referenced with the href:
xtrf is the absolute topic path
href is the relative path to the image

case 2: topic contains an image referenced with the keyref
xtrf is the absolute topic path
href is the relative path to the image

case 3: topic contains an image referenced with the keyref or href BUT one topicref ancestor referencing the topic has a copy-to which copies the file to a different location
xtrf is the absolute topic path of the original topic
href is the relative path to the image

body.p: The test case then is to have a parent topic that specifies copy-to and a descendant topic that has an image reference.
